Others: The Atlanta Braves made roster moves before Sunday's game against the Marlins in Miami, selecting the contract of RHP Dereck Rodriguez and optioning LHP Jared Shuster to Triple-A Gwinnett.
Dylan Lee was transferred to the 60-day IL due to soreness in his left shoulder.
Rodriguez has appeared on the active roster for the Braves this season in three games allowing just one run over 3.1 innings.
